other_tests.findings: Numerous gallstones present; cystic changes at gallbladder fundus consistent with focal adenomyomatosis; gallbladder wall decompressed without wall thickening; slight prominence of wall enhancement; moderate atrophy and fatty replacement of pancreatic parenchyma; small amount of stranding and edema about the pancreas; irregular and minimally prominent main pancreatic duct; mild hemosiderosis noted in spleen; unchanged 1.2 cm nodule in right adrenal gland dating back to unspecified date.
